text:
[Verse]
Sun is rising light is shining
Brand new day let's start the climbing
Feel the warmth upon your face
Get up now let's find our place

[Verse 2]
Sky is blue the birds are singing
Joy around it's all beginning
Step by step we move along
In this world where we belong

[Chorus]
Dance in the sunlight
All day and night
Feel the rhythm
Everything's bright

[Verse 3]
Waves are crashing on the shoreline
Footprints fading over time
Hold my hand let's make a vow
To live the moment here and now

[Verse 4]
Laughter fills the summer breezes
Love's a puzzle it just pieces
Every heartbeat tells our story
Moments here in all their glory

[Chorus]
Dance in the sunlight
All day and night
Feel the rhythm
Everything's bright
title: Sunshine Dance
